## REDROP\_POLICY\_ANY variable

Indicates that when dragging an existing connection by its source endpoint, it can be relocated onto some other source element by dropping it anywhere on that element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
REDROP_POLICY_ANY = "any"
```
